detaileddescription.para: This document contains the Software Detailed Design documentation for the CRC32_Mng_CrcHsm which is part of the CRC32_Mng functionality. It realizes the CRC facilities for Hardware Security Module (HSM) logical blocks.

Describes the detailed design of the CRC32_Mng_CrcHsm as defined in the SWA along with all allocated SWRs for this component. Design elements for requirements only partially allocated to this component will only cover that part.
